questionTitle: The only way to clean the box is to ________ it in soap and warm water.
It's ________ to rain again before morning.
Little Angela hasn't ________ her shyness yet.
The garage gave me a 5 per cent ________ for paying cash.
His cheek was very ________ after the wasp stung him.
________ I have an orange juice, please?
Trade Union officials and management met today to discuss the ________ at the factory.
She was unable to warn her mother that she would be late because the telephone was ________.
Don't ________ him to arrive early. He's always late.
Our teacher explains things so quickly that sometimes I can't ________ her.
I'm so sorry I'm late, the car broke ________ on my way here.
The Prime Minister signed the agreement ________ the British Government.
Who is going to pay ________ the damage?
George is jealous ________ his younger sister.
He might be good ________ his job, but you can't rely on him.
He had been completely exhausted but felt considerably ________ after a meal and a rest.
My eldest brother intends to take ________ skating next winter.
The bank ________ planned to escape in a stolen car.
Which surgeon is ________ this month?
Mary was very annoyed that her secretary did not meet her deadlines, and she warned her that her laziness and ________ could result in her dismissal.
